quotes.quote: You can fool all of the people all of the time if your effects budget is large enough.
quotes.author: Accomplishments

quotes.quote: If you're attractive enough on the outside, people will forgive you for being irritating to the core.
quotes.author: Beauty

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and lies before us are small matters compared to what lies right to our faces.
quotes.author: Propoganda

quotes.quote: The race for quality has no finish line, so technically, it's more like a death march.
quotes.author: Quality

quotes.quote: Having your moment in the sun isn't always a good thing.
quotes.author: Recognition

quotes.quote: Time heals all wounds. But it usually leaves a pretty big scar.
quotes.author: Recovery

quotes.quote: It hurts to admit when you make mistakes, but when they're big enough, the pain only lasts a second.
quotes.author: Regret

quotes.quote: Because you've given so much of yourself to the company that you don't have anything left we can use.
quotes.author: Retirement

quotes.quote: If you never try anything new, you'll miss out on many of life's great disappointments.
quotes.author: Risks

quotes.quote: Love is in the air. And it's pooping on my head.
quotes.author: Romance

quotes.quote: All we ask here is that you give us your heart.
quotes.author: Sacrifice

quotes.quote: Your role may be thankless, but if you're willing to give it your all, you just might bring success to those who outlast you.
quotes.author: Sacrifice

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to share your dreams with the world, because there's nothing the world loves more than the taste of really sweet dreams.
quotes.author: Bitterness

quotes.quote: Minds are like parachutes. Just because you've lost yours doesn't mean you can borrow mine.
quotes.author: Sanity

quotes.quote: Just because you think you're a star doesn't mean you're going anywhere.
quotes.author: Self-Esteem

quotes.quote: View all customers as beautiful buds that must be cultivated, watered, and periodically buried under manure.
quotes.author: Service

quotes.quote: As long as we have each other, we'll never run out of problems.
quotes.author: Strife

quotes.quote: Quitters never win, winners never quit, but those who never win AND never quit are idiots.
quotes.author: Stupidity

quotes.quote: Some people dream of success, while other people live to crush those dreams.
quotes.author: Success

quotes.quote: The less you stand out, the longer you'll last.
quotes.author: Survival

quotes.quote: A code word lazy people use when they want you to do all the work.
quotes.author: Synergy

quotes.quote: A few harmless flakes working together can unleash an avalanche of destruction.
quotes.author: Teamwork

quotes.quote: What is The Secret? Pretend you've already achieved it, Then offer to sell The Secret to others.
quotes.author: The Secret

quotes.quote: The secret to success is knowing who to blame for your failures.
quotes.author: Blame

quotes.quote: Just because you've always done it that way doesn't mean it's not incredibly stupid.
quotes.author: Tradition

quotes.quote: As long as there are children in the world, there will never be any real peace.
quotes.author: Tranquility

quotes.quote: Luck can't last a lifetime unless you die young.
quotes.author: Trouble

quotes.quote: The tallest blade of grass is the first to be cut by the lawnmower.
quotes.author: Underachievment

quotes.quote: Winners never fly higher than when they're bouncing up and down on the egos of those they defeat.
quotes.author: Victory

quotes.quote: How can the future be so hard to predict when all of my worst fears keep coming true?
quotes.author: Vision

quotes.quote: All I ask is for a chance to prove that money can't buy happiness.
quotes.author: Wealth

quotes.quote: If you expect to score points by whining, join a European soccer team.
quotes.author: Whining

quotes.quote: Because nothing says you're a loser more than owning a motivational poster about being a winner.
quotes.author: Winners

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only difference between a budding genius and a blooming idiot is where they choose to take a stand.
quotes.author: Wisdom

quotes.quote: Never before have so many people with so little to say said so much to so few.
quotes.author: Blogging

quotes.quote: Just because you're necessary doesn't mean you're important.
quotes.author: Worth

quotes.quote: Attitudes are contagious. Mine might kill you.
quotes.author: Burnout

quotes.quote: I expected times like this, but I never thought they'd be so bad, so long, and so frequent.
quotes.author: Challenges

quotes.quote: Politicians are like diapers. They need to be changed often and for the same reason.
quotes.author: Change

quotes.quote: When the winds of change blow hard enough, the most trivial of things can become deadly projectiles.
quotes.author: Change

quotes.quote: There are no stupid questions, but there are a LOT of inquisitive idiots.
quotes.author: Cluelessness

quotes.quote: When a motivated group of people join together, they can turn problems into opportunities. Especially drinking problems.
quotes.author: Collaboration

quotes.quote: You can do anything you set your mind to when you have vision, determination, and an endless supply of expendable labor.
quotes.author: Achievement

quotes.quote: Let's agree to respect each others views, no matter how wrong yours may be.
quotes.author: Compromise

quotes.quote: When people are free to do as they please, they usually imitate each other.
quotes.author: Conformity

quotes.quote: Proudly defending the status quo long after the quo has lost its status.
quotes.author: Congress

quotes.quote: It's only a virtue if you're not a screwup.
quotes.author: Consistency

quotes.quote: If you're not a part of the solution, there's good money to be made in prolonging the problem.
quotes.author: Consulting

quotes.quote: I want either less corruption or more opportunity to participate in it.
quotes.author: Corruption

quotes.quote: Helps artists die young, miserable, and penniless- so their art can have meaning to the old, satisfied, and obscenely rich.
quotes.author: Creativity

quotes.quote: Some Places Remain Unknown Because No One Has Ventured Forth. Others Remain So Because No One Has Ever Come Back.
quotes.author: Curiosity

quotes.quote: If we really cared for the customer we'd send them somewhere better.
quotes.author: Customer Care

quotes.quote: Because we're not satisfied until you're not satisfied.
quotes.author: Customer Disservice

quotes.quote: The discovery that you're no longer a big fish in a small pond, or even a small fish in a big pond, but a small fish in a big fish.
quotes.author: Acquisition

quotes.quote: When birds fly in the right formation, they need only exert half the effort. Even in nature, teamwork results in collective laziness.
quotes.author: Dare To Slack

quotes.quote: For every winner, there are dozens of losers. Odds are you're one of them.
quotes.author: Defeat

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best solution to morale problems is just to fire all of the unhappy people.
quotes.author: Demotivation

quotes.quote: It's always darkest just before it goes pitch black.
quotes.author: Despair

quotes.quote: You were meant for me. Perhaps as a punishment.
quotes.author: Destiny

quotes.quote: A company that will go to the ends of the Earth for its people will find it can hire them for about 10% of the cost of Americans.
quotes.author: Discovery

quotes.quote: There comes a time when every team must learn to make individual sacrifices.
quotes.author: Disloyalty

quotes.quote: That which does not kill me postpones the inevitable.
quotes.author: Adversity

quotes.quote: In the battle between you and the world, bet on the world.
quotes.author: Doubt

quotes.quote: Dreams are like rainbows. Only idiots chase them.
quotes.author: Dreams

quotes.quote: The only consistent feature in all of your dissatisfying relationships is you.
quotes.author: Dysfunction

quotes.quote: The science of explaining tomorrow why the predictions you made yesterday didn't come true today.
quotes.author: Economics

quotes.quote: Hard work never killed anybody, but it is illegal in some places.
quotes.author: Effort

quotes.quote: It's lonely at the top, but it's comforting to look down upon everyone at the bottom.
quotes.author: Elitism

quotes.quote: If you keep asking others to give you the benefit of the doubt, they'll eventually start to doubt your benefit.
quotes.author: Excuses

quotes.quote: When your best just isn't good enough.
quotes.author: Failure

quotes.quote: Until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore, you will not know the terror of being forever lost at sea.
quotes.author: Fear

quotes.quote: If you want to get to the top, prepare to kiss a lot of the bottom.
quotes.author: Flattery

quotes.quote: Not all pain is gain.
quotes.author: Agony

quotes.quote: I may not agree with what you say, but I respect your right to be punished for it.
quotes.author: Freedom

quotes.quote: You'll always miss 100% of the shots you don't take, and, statistically speaking, 99% of the shots you do.
quotes.author: Futility

quotes.quote: You aren't being paid to believe in the power of your dreams.
quotes.author: Get To Work

quotes.quote: At some point, hanging in there just makes you look like an even bigger loser.
quotes.author: Give Up

quotes.quote: It's best to avoid standing directly between a competitive jerk and his goals.
quotes.author: Goals

quotes.quote: If you think the problems we create are bad, just wait until you see our solutions.
quotes.author: Government

quotes.quote: There is an island of opportunity in the middle of every difficulty. Miss that, though, and you're pretty much doomed.
quotes.author: Hazards

quotes.quote: May not be warranted at this point.
quotes.author: Hope

quotes.quote: The harder you try the dumber you look.
quotes.author: Humiliation

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try -- HA HA HA HA HA HA! Sorry. It's just that first attempt was so hilarious.
quotes.author: Humiliation

quotes.quote: It takes 43 muscles to frown and 17 to smile, but it doesn't take any to just sit there with a dumb look on your face.
quotes.author: Indifference

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are unique. Just like everybody else.
quotes.author: Individuality

quotes.quote: If you can't learn to do something well, learn to enjoy doing it poorly.
quotes.author: Ineptitude

quotes.quote: If it can make your job easier, it can probably make it irrelevant.
quotes.author: Innovation

quotes.quote: It's difficult to comprehend how insane some people can be. Especially when you're insane.
quotes.author: Insanity

quotes.quote: You don't have to be crazy to work here -- but actually just kidding you do have to be crazy to work here. Sorry.
quotes.author: Insanity

quotes.quote: Genius is 1 percent inspiration and 99% perspiration, which is why engineers sometimes smell really bad.
quotes.author: Inspiration

quotes.quote: If we don't take care of the customer, maybe they'll stop bugging us.
quotes.author: Apathy

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent, but you'd be a fool to withhold that from your superiors.
quotes.author: Intimidation

quotes.quote: The best leaders inspire by example. When that's not an option, brute intimidation works pretty well, too.
quotes.author: Arrogance

quotes.quote: You're good enough, you're smart enough, and doggone it, people are terrified of you.
quotes.author: Arrogance

quotes.quote: No single raindrop believes it is to blame for the flood.
quotes.author: Irresponsibility

quotes.quote: Because making it look good now is more important than providing adequate support later.
quotes.author: Marketing

quotes.quote: If you're tired of others looking down on you, grow the hell up.
quotes.author: Maturity

quotes.quote: It takes a lot less time and most people won't notice the difference until it's too late.
quotes.author: Mediocrity

quotes.quote: None of us is as dumb as all of us.
quotes.author: Meetings

quotes.quote: While good fortune often eludes you, this kind never misses.
quotes.author: Misfortune

quotes.quote: It could be that the purpose of your life is only to serve as a warning to others.
quotes.author: Mistakes

quotes.quote: If a pretty poster and a cute saying are all it takes to motivate you, you probably have a very easy job. The kind robots will be doing soon.
quotes.author: Motivation

quotes.quote: We promote family values here, almost as often as we promote family members.
quotes.author: Nepotism

quotes.quote: Before you attempt to beat the odds, be sure you could survive the odds beating you.
quotes.author: Overconfidence

quotes.quote: The courage to ignore the obvious wisdom of turning back.
quotes.author: Perseverance

quotes.quote: You get knocked down. But you get up again. Ain’t never going to keep you down. Because you’re a glutton for punishment. And kind of an idiot.
quotes.author: Perseverance

quotes.quote: It's her loss, man. It's her loss. I mean, it's more your loss, but, you know.
quotes.author: Persistence

quotes.quote: It's over, man. Let her go.
quotes.author: Persistence

quotes.quote: Less is more. Unless you're standing next to the one with more. Then less just looks pathetic.
quotes.author: Perspective

quotes.quote: Much work remains to be done before we can announce our total failure to make any progress.
quotes.author: Planning

quotes.quote: With focus, dedication and steroids, men can achieve impossible dreams. Like breaking a world record. Or growing their own breasts.
quotes.author: Possibilities

quotes.quote: Not everyone gets to be an astronaut when they grow up.
quotes.author: Potential

quotes.quote: Power corrupts. Absolute power corrupts absolutely. But it rocks absolutely, too.
quotes.author: Power

quotes.quote: It can turn a lump of coal into a flawless diamond, or an average person into a perfect basketcase.
quotes.author: Pressure

quotes.quote: The downside of being better than everyone else is that people tend to assume you're pretentious.
quotes.author: Pretension

quotes.quote: No matter how great and destructive your problems may seem now, remember, you've probably only seen the tip of them.
quotes.author: Problems

quotes.quote: Hard work often pays off after time, but laziness always pays off now.
quotes.author: Procrastination
